thread.section_title: Hotel Papa Germano - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great simple place to sleep
thread.title_full: Great simple place to sleep - Review of Hotel Papa Germano, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Andrewchedore
title: Great simple place to sleep
text: If you just want a place to sleep while you enjoy Rome this is it. Close to termini station and all kinds of restaurants. Very helpful and friendly staff. You share a washroom with others on your floor...2 other rooms...i never saw anyone else though! Thanks papa germano staff.
